types:type.name: users-input-payload-format
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type users_input_payload_format = Array<{| "﻿user_id": String, first_name: String, last_name: String, email: String, active: String, created: String, export_bit: String, table: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: user-address-input-payload-format
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type user_address_input_payload_format = Array<{| "﻿user_id": String, address_id: String, street: String, city: String, state: String, zipcode: String, created: String, export_bit: String, table: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: user-orders-input-payload-format
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type user_orders_input_payload_format = Array<{| "﻿id": String, user_id: String, order_id: String, total: String, order_date: String, export_bit: String, table: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: user-order-details-input-payload-format
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type user_order_details_input_payload_format = Array<{| "﻿user_id": String, order_id: String, item: String, price: String, quantity: String, total: String, order_date: String, export_bit: String, table: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: payment-status-input-payload-format
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type payment_status_input_payload_format = Array<{| "﻿id": String, user_id: String, order_id: String, status: String, amount: String, payment_mode: String, export_bit: String, table: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}
